name: NEONPLAGUE Shareware Edition
description:
Prototype built for My First Game Jam Summer 2021.

A retro-inspired FPS in the vein of Wolfenstein 3D, built within the Raycasting Game Maker Engine. 

Free the hostages. Clear the floors. Reach the horrors at the heart of the hospital.

Contains blood and gore.

CREDITS

  • Design by Roxanne B. (f3arofthedark)
  • Art by Avriil
  • Music and Sound by Luxon
